Name: Building Caretakers
Description (tasks and duties): Workers in this unit group take care of apartment houses, office buildings, churches and other buildings and maintain them in an orderly and clean condition. Their functions include: attending to the operation of an apartment house as representative of owner or managing agent; keeping apartment house, office or similar building in clean and orderly condition and operating furnaces or boilers to provide heat and hot water for tenants; taking care of interior and furnishings of churches; performing similar tasks in other establishment.

Name: Charworkers, Cleaners and Related Workers
Description (tasks and duties): Workers in this unit group clean the interiors, windows and chimneys of buildings. Their functions include: cleaning and keeping in an orderly condition the interiors of public buildings, office, factories, commercial establishments, apartment and private houses; cleaning windows in buildings; removing soot from flues, chimneys and connecting pipes; performing other cleaning tasks similar to the foregoing.
